mapper.sql: id, owner, source, customer, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time, address
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_contacts as contacts join tbl_user as user1 on user1.id = contacts.owner left join tbl_dic_value as dic1 on dic1.id = contacts.source left join tbl_customer as customer on customer.id = contacts.customer
and user1.name like "%" #{owner} "%"
and contacts.fullname like "%" #{fullname} "%"
and customer.name like "%${customer}%"
and dic1.id = #{source}
